Sentencas: Yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) has been studied as a promising material for application as an electrolyte in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: On the synthesis of yttria-stabilized zirconia: a comparative study

Sentencas: In this work, YSZ powders ((xY(2)O(3) - (1 - x)ZrO2), x = 5, 8 and 10 mol%) were synthesized by three different methods: co-precipitation, sol-gel combustion and sol-gel.
Titulo: On the synthesis of yttria-stabilized zirconia: a comparative study

Sentencas: The precursor solution obtained by sol-gel method was successfully applied for chemical solution deposition of YSZ thin films on Si(100)/SiO2 substrates.
Titulo: On the synthesis of yttria-stabilized zirconia: a comparative study

Sentencas: The thermal behavior of Y-Zr-O precursor gels and precipitated Y-Zr oxalates were investigated by TG-DSC measurements.
Titulo: On the synthesis of yttria-stabilized zirconia: a comparative study

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction analysis was utilized for the characterization of phase purity and crystallinity.
Titulo: On the synthesis of yttria-stabilized zirconia: a comparative study

Sentencas: Scanning electron microscopy was employed for the estimation of surface morphology features.
Titulo: On the synthesis of yttria-stabilized zirconia: a comparative study

Sentencas: The quality of obtained ceramic samples strongly depends on the morphology of initial powders.
Titulo: On the synthesis of yttria-stabilized zirconia: a comparative study

Sentencas: Electrical properties of synthesized ceramics were studied by means of impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: On the synthesis of yttria-stabilized zirconia: a comparative study

Sentencas: The highest ionic conductivity was observed for samples prepared by sol-gel combustion synthesis route.
Titulo: On the synthesis of yttria-stabilized zirconia: a comparative study
On the synthesis of yttria-stabilized zirconia: a comparative study
